Hey! How can I help?

Yeah... It's something about one of my long time friends. Well, she asked me to hang out and I refused her because of the pandemic. So, she now thinks I'm a selfish person and blocked me away. The seeker  was telling me about her boyfriend's work in nashville, as if i hadn't heard about it before. i didn't want to hear it, so i ignored it. the same with the other questions : was the pandemic really terminal? the seeker asked me, how could it be? i didn't know what to say. i didn't know what to do. i didn't know if
I understand how you are feeling about that..

dialog.text: I don't understand why she thinks I'm being selfish. I offered to hang out, but she didn't want me to. So, she thinks I should just deal with it? The seeker  decided that there is no possible way that i can help her. so, i decided to visit her. i was just waiting for her to open the door.
I think she is being selfish and insecure and is projecting it onto you.

dialog.text: I think you're right. She sounds a lot like my ex-husband! The seeker  thinks that she is being selfish, but she is also wrong. that doesn't mean you are being selfish.

I think you should set up some boundaries and tell her that you do not want to be friends with her anymore. If she wants to talk to you, she will reach out. I think you should be strong and stand up for yourself.
beam_texts: I think you should set up some boundaries and tell her that you do not want to be friends with her anymore. If she wants to talk to you, she will reach out. I think you should be strong and stand up for yourself.
